posts.postText:
If anyone wants to write a guest post for the [NNJG] Blog, send me an email via REDACTED@REDACTED with the title and content.
Things to post could be things like "How to be a good detective" or "How to keep prisoners under control". Could be cool to have a couple posts a week.
Inferno has some jail guides in the jail section that sound very similar to what you are looking for.
